website_summaries.verdict: Professional-grade cookware ideal for commercial users and experienced home cooks. Use of three different metals means even cooking and quick heating. External layer is stainless steel. Expensive, but worth the investment for durability.
pros: Oven-safe to 600 degrees F, higher than others
Smooth, flat bottoms will not scratch glass stove tops
cons: Handles can get hotter than expected
Burned food and scorch marks difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Description wrong! I didn't get the chefs pan in this set. Came with dutch oven.
customer_reviews.text: I just assumed when you spend this kind of money on a set you get what the description says. This was supposed to come with a chef's pan which is what I use most of all. There was none. Instead I got a dutch oven. I had let my sister unpack this and she did not check so its too late to return this. But the cookware is amazing!!!!!. Just too bad their ads are wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of hard-anodized Rachel Ray pots/pans for just over 13 years and I finally upgraded to this D3 set. They are incredible. They take a little bit of an adjustment coming from what I had because they what so more efficiently than I was used to. If you heat them properly (see YouTube videos), add you oil/butter at the proper time, and then the food, nothing sticks to them and clean up is a snap. I wound up getting the saucier pans, the butter warmer, the big stockpot, and a the 8” fry pan...basically the entire D3 collection. I won’t ever buy another pot/pan again in my lifetime. Incredible value. I’m inspired to cook again.
customer_reviews.author: evh347

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: Item received included a 5.5 qt Dutch oven instead of the 12" chef's pan in the description. This is an old version of the 14-piece set that All-Clad doesn't offer anymore. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: polymerase

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase this item sight unseen!
customer_reviews.text: Highly suggest NOT ordering this product online. After receiving and opening the individual boxes of cookware, several had marks and blemishes. I sent the set back to the manufacturer for replacement under the "Lifetime Warranty" only to have them returned in worse condition than they were sent indicating that they were not eligible for replacement as the pits and blemishes would not impact the cooking performance. Absolutely the worst customer service experience I have ever had. If you purchase this product, make sure you are able to inspect the quality of each piece first.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M Mulston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans! Heat up fast, evenly, and wash easily. Seller was great!
customer_reviews.author: William Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality manufacturing. Superb look. Need to use Barkeeps Friend to clean if you use higher heat or some oils.
customer_reviews.author: Blue-Eyed Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These pots are SO not worth the money! I wish I could have returned them. The handles get extremely hot and everything sticks. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TALC

customer_reviews.title: Simple and really cool
customer_reviews.text: Read upon induction after we lost the burner and then the glass top cracked getting up a radiant heat cooktop. Induction info impressed me. Better than gas and more efficient than eletric competion. The pans are the best easy to clean; no scratching using soft rubbing. Must keep them lightly greased because it cooks so much hotter than all else. It will boil water in less than 60 seconds for small to medium pans two minutes for large. Loveit and cook much better. Smiles from all.
customer_reviews.author: David Finley

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cookware, a must for anyone who loves to cook
customer_reviews.author: David C. Strange

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is a great set. Good price for all the pieces. Just be aware the one big pan is HUGE. does not work real well on my 30 inch cook top. but all pans and lids are good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Roll

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly and evenly. Dishwasher safe! Oven safe!
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set is fantastic. It heats up quickly and evenly on our gas range. I like that it is dishwasher safe. The manufacturer says some discoloration will occur if put in the dishwasher, but it's not harmful. I don't care what it looks like as long as it works great. And it does. This is the first cookware that I am able to take from the stovetop to the oven and it opens up a new world of cooking for me. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product to use. Manufacturer offered no help. Would love to return them but they won't take them back
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: ALL CLAD - Worst Customer Service I ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: Within a few months use, my fry pan was ruined. I sent back to All Clad to take a look and see if the pan may be replaced under warranty. Not only does no one ever answer the phones or respond to emails. After 4 months they finally responded and said they received my pan, but they cannot replace under the terms of the warranty. Fine, that is OK. But another 4 months go by and I still not have received my pan back. I call and email, no response. I paid $500+ for this set of 3 half a$$ed pans, I expect a little better service than this. I'll never buy an ALL CLAD product again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it turned yellow. I contacted the company cause they say lifetime warrenty, but they said they don’t cover stains and that when you use their pans the first time, they turn blue, yellow, or purple. That’s the first time I hear of this. I told them the cheaper pans don’t do this but this expensive one becomes discolored. They said cause this is better. That’s nonsense. These pans are trash. They get ruined with the first use and they are so sticky if you try cooking anything. The only thing they can do is boil water without ruining it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pots and pans but beware when cooking eggs.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent pots and pans. A gigantic upgrade from what we had before. However, I do have one caveat for you. If you cook eggs in these things, they will be an absolute beast to clean. No matter how much olive oil you put in the pan to counteract them sticking, they will still stick. Then the cleanup afterward will be a huge chore. Just take that into mind. Anything else we've cooked in them has worked well, but for some reason eggs leave a terrible, sticky mess.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Awful to clean!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these pans as a safe option for our family. We wanted a healthy pan that we can cook stovetop & transfer to the oven. They are pretty, distributes heat well... However, I have Spent HOURS scrubbing them! Using every trick I can find on the internet. We cook with avocado oil & have burnt eggs & protein pancakes to these pans beyond repair. I am so upset with the money we wasted on these. What a fun stressor to add to an already stressful pandemic... I would rather be at work (in my hospital!) that scrubbing these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Everything Sticks even on low heat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cookware because I heard it was the best. Everything we cook sticks to it. I called All Clad and they won't let me return or exchange it. They told me I was using too high of heat. They emailed me instructions and I have followed them (cook on low heat) and everything I cook still sticks. Do not purchase All Clad unless you get the non-stick version. I am very disappointed as these were over $500.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're not all they're cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: This set is nice looking, they heat well, but they're ultimately not worth the money. All Clad touts heat distribution but I was just cooking the other night and disagree that the heat distribution is their strong point. Also be very wary about what you're getting - not only are these not non-stick, but they're actually pretty sticky. I cooked eggs in the pan on the first day of owning them and the pan is totally ruined. All Clad's customer service department was rude at best and said too bad, you shouldn't be cooking eggs in this pan. If given the choice, I'd return these for a full refund. I got the exact opposite of this choice though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Don't cut yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set until the edges started getting sharp and I cut my thumb hand-washing one of the pots. When we contacted All-Clad to replace the set, they said the dishwasher detergent eats away at the edge and sharpens them! Won't be using these any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Maestra

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect information in description. 8 quart stockpot is actually 6 quart and 3 quart stockpot is actually 2 quart. Additionally I noticed some small manufacturing defects, I believe these are actually seconds being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Crazed Cook

customer_reviews.title: I received a wrong 7-set
customer_reviews.text: The description and the image says this set includes a 3 qt saute pan, but instead I received a set with a 2 qt sauce pan with is totally different! and I choose this set specially for this saute pan.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo

customer_reviews.title: D3 are Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Years ago bought a lesser brand. Seemed like it Looked the same. Figured it was hype. I really regret those wasted years of extra scrubbing, uneven cooking...I thought that was just what cooking was about. It’s not. If you can afford these, they are worth it. Those ones with the disk on the bottom that do not come up around the side are inferior. All clad D3 are great. I can’t comment on the higher end, are they worth the delta? I don’t know, but very happy with D3.
customer_reviews.author: WSM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive my stainless steel pans because I believed in their quality. I went beyond my budget and bought the five piece set for $400. As you see in the picture this pan is rusty. It is unbelievable that this pan passed the tests. The company is not even doing a final check before shipping. You get a pretty good idea about the quality of the product (which is the most expansive one in the market) when an unused pan is rusted. I guess just putting a "made in America" label does not guarantee the quality of the product. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: erdem ilter

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched set
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 10pc all clad d3 beautiful set. It arrived well packed despite tracking info said damaged going back to shipper. BUT it was very dissappointing to find the large kettle is not the one that matches the set. No all clad band under the handles like the rest of the set and the weight is not up to par with the rest of the set. Too much work to return . First full set of cookware I have every purchased.and a gift at that. Will buy separately from now on.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: If you like to cook, these are worth the money. They cook evenly, unlike other cheaper pans. You can really notice the difference while cooking. I won’t go back to cheap pans again. This variety pack has the basics pans/pots I use on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Winn

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans
customer_reviews.text: Waited to write a review. I have had this for about 8 months. I love these pans. I will never use anything else. It was my first SS, so there was a learning curve to cooking on them...but that took no time at all. Bar Keepers friend is a great cleaning tool and can make the pans look like new. No regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous to spend this much on a lot and pan set, but All Clad definitely delivers on quality and they’re made in the USA to boot! Excellent quality products - very sturdy handles and they are assembled in such a way that water nor grime or food bits can get caught in edges. They are dishwasher friendly which I love. I expect we will use these for many many years!
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Work great with my new induction cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they work with my new induction cooktop. Takes some getting used to if you like non-stick. I purchased two nonstick skillets for eggs, but otherwise these work great. I have been hand washing them based on others reviews that they don’t hold up to the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first All Clad set
customer_reviews.text: This is my first All Clad set and I use these pots and pans every day. The heat distribution is good. Stainless steel sticks quite a bit, so I find myself preheating the pans with olive oil or lard, it helps things like eggs from sticking. Also, when food does stick too much, I use barkeepers friend cleaner with a scrub pad to remove the stains and it gets the pans looking like new again. Overall, I'm really happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Heck

customer_reviews.title: Poor results on first use.  Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Uncleanable staining/pitting on first use of 3 quart pot. Neither opened nor used the sauté pan or the frying pan for fear of the same.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Wow! what an improvement
customer_reviews.text: We have been loving these since the day they arrived. The bottoms are flat so the oil is distributed, they heat up quickly and evenly. They have been a breeze to clean. I cannot believe I lived with the old pots for so long. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Top tier product. Highly recommend for the serious cook/chef
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a Amazon Wearhouse special due to packaging damage and a tiny imperfection on one of the lids from that damage. Saved $100. These are top rated pans and you can tell it is a top tier product. These should be pans for life. Im a chef and these are perfect all away round. Might be a bit heavy for a petite person.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pans. They evenly distribute heat, they look nice and the clean up is extremely easy. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: loretta baynes

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to the best
customer_reviews.text: These are not cheap- but are you buying pots and pans more than once in your life? So all you real cooks out there... save up and then trade up to the best there is. You’ll have them forever and you’ll be so happy.
customer_reviews.author: DCT

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product so far. Also, All-Clad has outstanding customer service. Will buy more from these folks.
customer_reviews.author: JCO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, well-made cookware
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few different cookware sets over many years and all were pretty low cost sets I purchased for value. Although I got the meals to the table, they weren't particularly well made. These All-Clad pots and pans are great! They are heavy duty and easy to care for. I can easily prepare meals and (almost) never burn anything. Expensive, but I think the difference is worth the price. I'll be able to leave these in my will.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Foods do not stick when using on medium to high heat (watch out at high heat). A great set - hope to get a matching steamer for the stock pot. There is little discoloration at bottom of the sauce pan from using on electric range. A little pricey but a great kitchen investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Made my wife's Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Wife absolutely fell in love with these! Loved the idea of buying once. There's a learning curve with cooking and cleaning, but we will be adding more in the future. Highly recommend as a gift for someone that appreciates the best.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Its how they cook not how they look
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware! They are fabulous and are truly non-sticking. They just need to soak briefly before washing them. I don't care that it is hard to keep shiny. These are professional pans. If you've ever seen a real restaurant kitchen you will note the pans look used. Its about how they cook and less how they look!
customer_reviews.author: G Scott Provost

customer_reviews.title: First class pots and pans!  Will last forever.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. My wife wanted new pots and pans so I went for the best. She was surprised and very happy to donate her old miss matches sets for this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: tstrasser

customer_reviews.title: I only used once to do white rice and look at the pictures! too expensive for this.
customer_reviews.text: First time used I follow manufacturer's recommendations , did some rice and end up like this, another one I just boil water and get stains everywhere I'll return al I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge oceguera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cookware
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cookware. Heats very evenly and is excellent for searing and sauces. It does require specific cooking techniques as it is not non-stick and also greater effort of care . Do some research on technique and care before purchasing this if you are inexperienced with stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Gift recipient happy, even after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. After 6 months of use, recipient said it warrants a five-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Love it and will use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I did my research before making this huge purchase. I believe I got a good deal. This is quality cookware that will last for my lifetime. I plan on purchasing more pots, pans, and bowls to compliment the set. I recommend the stainless steel over any other type that is covered with a coating. It's healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: We love these pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: We got these to replace the non-stick pans that we had so we were worried about cleaning. However, if you use them correctly they clean pretty well. It is a good number of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love my pans!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pans. Amazing to cook with on the gas stove. The quality of how it cooks is really improving my Quality of food I’m putting out.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Just needed to buy the little pot 1qt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of cookware. Heat evenly distributes and product easily cleans. Only complaint is wish they came with removable silicone handle covers... pot lids get rather hot.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: D3 Stainless steel 7 piece set
customer_reviews.text: 7 piece set sizes were smaller than advertised in the description, but Amazon stood behind it and made an adjustment. The set itself is beautiful and retains heat exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.author: terry riley

customer_reviews.title: These pots and pans clean up so effortlessly. Be ...
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans clean up so effortlessly. Be careful when salting food though. Add your spices before putting food in these because if you shake salt over these while preparing the pan you may get some pitting.
customer_reviews.author: OneCardAway

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: No need for reviews . I love this product .
customer_reviews.author: Tulasi chaganti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to find all-clad on Amazon. We used some gift cards from our wedding to purchase the set. Our first nice (non ikea) pots and pans and couldn’t be happier! Did a lot of research on pans and these are doing great!
customer_reviews.author: harris j waters

customer_reviews.title: I love theae
customer_reviews.text: Love the pans. I really like the way they cook and the taste is better. The only issue I had was lowering the temperature to cook food. I was so used to cooking everything at a higher temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tuomy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Condition and seller said it was in good condition
customer_reviews.text: The condition was labeled at "good". However, there were big gouges on the lids. The pots and pans were well used and scratched--but the lids were the worse. They were just thrown into the box with only half of them wrapped. I thought the add description was very misleading. Disappointed in purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: They are really well made and while I haven't used them for too long it looks like they will last for a long time. They heat really evenly. Being able to put them right into the oven was one of the main draws for me. They look pretty sharp too if that matters to ya.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bogucki

customer_reviews.title: Invoice and pricing wrong!!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the price I was charged --- the invoice I received was to another customer and almost 200. less. What the heck?
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe discontent

customer_reviews.title: and All Clad was recommended to me
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a set of pots and pans that were 100% safe to use! and All Clad was recommended to me. When I received the set I was very pleasantly surprised at how sturdy they were and also pretty :) been using them for about a month and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my wife received this 10pc set of all-clad cookware and just simply loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All-Clad - way to go
customer_reviews.text: My starter set to which I have added many pieces to - I cook a lot and this is the greatest cookware I have ever owned. For sure I will have them for many, many years to come. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: happyday

customer_reviews.title: My pan lust finally fulfilled!
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted these and after cooking with them now I know why. I've switched to induction cooking and needed new pans for compatibility with the burners. These pots are like a match made in heaven! I've never had so much temperature control in my life. I hope I have these pans for the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: dstayner

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new decent set of pots and pans. These have been great! The stainless steel shows stains and the pans are sometimes hard to keep clean (they get cloudy) but the pots are super easy to clean and maintain
customer_reviews.author: Beth Soldner

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality cookware that requires some dedicated maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: Great cookware that requires attention if keeping it looking like new is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: GIL A

customer_reviews.title: A Real Gem for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had these three on sale at a great reduction in price and I bought them for my daughter. She treasures them and proudly uses them for parties with the ohhhhhs and ahhhhhs of friends who enjoy the food cooked delicately in them.
customer_reviews.author: charliebargain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cookware
customer_reviews.text: I love these pots and pans. They clean up easily and cook wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: A great investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set about a year ago after going back and forth about whether to get it for a while. Get it! It's incredibly hardy and durable, cooks very well, and looks great. Can't imagine my kitchen without it.
customer_reviews.author: mapleleaf

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Top notch quality pan and pot set!!! The customer service was amazing too I highly recommend the product and seller, Thanks Jessica!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T McClure

customer_reviews.title: Best in show
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and efficient. Well worth the cost. Best product of its kind. Bought them after a kitchen remodel that included a pot rack and not shy about having them on display at all times.
customer_reviews.author: KasaC

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a wedding present. The bride and groom specifically requested this particular set!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Dunderdale

customer_reviews.title: Top rated for a reason!
customer_reviews.text: This cookware is definitely better than I needed, but I love to use top-end "tools" of all sorts. The pots and pans are heavy and beautifully finished. I bought them based on a comparison rating from a PBS cooking show, and I am not disappointed. They are, however, much more expensive than some cookware that rated almost as high, but I confess that I like to have the bragging rights for having the best - even if my cooking doesn't match the cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J

customer_reviews.title: a great starter set
customer_reviews.text: never buy anything less than All Clad...it is worth saving for. I personally love the look of Demeyere but feel that All Clad delivers in the beautiful outcome and easy clean up categories
customer_reviews.author: oshenandoah

customer_reviews.title: what a deal and best quality
customer_reviews.text: I have several All-Clad pieces which I slowly acquired over 5 years to build my set. I wish I had discovered Amazon sooner. All-Clad is the best product ever. If you burn the pan you just use a cleaning product called "bar keepers friend" and it is like brand new again. I bought this exact set once for my sister and again for my brother both asa house warming present. It is a perfect starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: and they're still in great shape and a joy to cook with
customer_reviews.text: I've had All Clad pans for the last 20 years, and they're still in great shape and a joy to cook with, so I bought a set for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: JIA

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent, simple, perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'd never had good pans until I sprang for these, and now I know what I'd been missing. Quick, even heating. Light weight. Even easy cleaning: I've used nothing to prevent stuck food in mine aside from using olive oil with just about everything I've prepared in them, and have had no issues. That they are dishwasher safe is just icing on the cake. Would definitely recommend, and would buy again... if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: pianophile

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad is good stuff. This was a gift for my husband and he was very, very pleased with his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cook ware.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the set. They are well made, and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: impressed with how well packaged it came first off. ...
customer_reviews.text: impressed with how well packaged it came first off. then also the items themselves are quite shiny and i loooove shiny. impressed also with the performance, haven't had problems with food sticking or cooking only on one side or burning. the pan does however lose it's luster on the insides. i've done some fair amount of cooking and gentle cleaning only by hand and the outside stayed sparkly but the insides have slightly discolored.
customer_reviews.author: Su

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these durable and healthy pans for cooking. You definitely have to learn to cook slower and clean differently but worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Living Stoked

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived on time and in perfect condition. The pieces are all well made and live up to the All Clad reputation. I am going to buy some silicone sleeves for the handles and lids, as those do get hot. I can see this being the last set of cookware I need to buy.
customer_reviews.author: TheBookFetish

customer_reviews.title: So glad I have these
customer_reviews.text: I love my all-clad pans. I'm so glad I invested in these. I will definitely buy more int he future to round out my collection.
customer_reviews.author: K. Christo

customer_reviews.title: No special cleaners for me.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for two years now and they're perfect. Very rarely ever used anything other than dish soap and a blue sponge. Leave these in the sink with plenty of water all the time and never ran into oxidation problems.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Last pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to only buy one set of pots and pans. Only downside is that I want more all-clad.
customer_reviews.author: CAM33

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What is not to love about All-Clad! They are as wonderful as expected, love the set!
customer_reviews.author: Amy J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to give up my worn out non-stick pots and pans, but due to potential health issues associated with them, I bought the All-Clad 10 piece cookware. Surprisingly this cookware is very easy to clean. For the tougher jobs, a little pre-soak is all that is needed. Although a little pricey, these pots and pans cook food evenly and fast. They are heavy, and the handles will get hot so pot holders will be necessary. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, already loving using these pans for my cooking adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: While much more expensive than others, I can really see why and it is totally worth the price. I aim to replace all my old stuff with All Clad.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: All Clad is Epic
customer_reviews.text: I never quite appreciated what a difference good pans like this would make until my first dish. It's a tangible difference from anything else I've used / owned. I'll definitely be an all-clad customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: DRA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware! i can trust it! Cooking has never gone so smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Save your time, energy, and the earth. Quit replacing cheap cookware every few years and buy All-Clad. Great starter set you will use for life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: All-Clad
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, perfect, wonderful. even heating, easy to clean. bar keepers friend once in a while keeps them super shiny. in love.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this item as a gift and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: K & N Sales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this cookware. I am learning new methods for taking care of these utensils. Nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is no other product that compares to the quality of ALL-Clad.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Real great!
customer_reviews.text: Great pans! Replaced our old set and these are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: Just a pain to keep looking new but really easy to clean the food and things off
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Just a pain to keep looking new but really easy to clean the food and things off of
customer_reviews.author: Brian Passmore

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with All-Clad!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she was over-the-top thrilled with the gift. This is excellent cookware!
customer_reviews.author: gmrob

customer_reviews.title: Over Rated
customer_reviews.text: High maintenance to clean. Uncomfortable handles. Works on my induction stove top.
customer_reviews.author: bb sue

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding pans. As long as you follow the directions (light coating of oil before heating - I use a paper towel with a bit of oil on it) they are essentially non-stick! Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Kuchta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and Complete
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for a new kitchen and the set covers all our needs. They are sturdy. The long handles stay cool so pot holders are not needed for average cooking times. They are extremely attractive and are well polished. Even though we have storage drawers, I would not hesitate to display them on a rack system.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I like to cook and had All-Clad cookware in the past, so I was familiar with the quality. Very solidly built, and will last a lifetime if you take care of them. They are not non-stick, but still clean up nicely, especially since they work well with low heat.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G. Kirton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: have to treat the pans prior to use but good product.
customer_reviews.author: mike

product_meta.title: All-Clad Stainless Steel Tri-Ply Bonded Dishwasher Safe Cookware Set, 14-Piece, Silver
product_meta.description: A useful and versatile array of everyday essentials, this All-Clad Stainless 401716 14-piece cookware set includes 10-Inch and 12-Inch fry pans, 2-Quart and 3-Quart sauce pans with lids, 3 quart and 6-Quart sauté pans with lids, 12-Inch chef's pan and an 8-Quart stockpot with lid. All-Clad’s Stainless 3-ply cookware features a thick-gauge aluminum core that attracts heat fast, while the addition of stainless steel ensures even heat distribution for consistent results across the entire cooking surface, all the way to the rim. Even more, its stainless-steel interior with a starburst finish offers natural stick resistance, letting you know when food is ready to release, and it won’t react with ingredients, so there’s no risk of food picking up a metallic taste. Made in the USA, this stainless-steel cookware offers warp-resistant strength and dishwasher-safe convenience, plus it can be used on any cooktop, including induction. Discover what it means to cook with All-Clad’s most popular cookware collection—All-Clad Stainless is a classic choice for anyone who loves to cook.
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES: 10-Inch and 12-Inch fry pans, 2-Quart and 3-Quart sauce pans with lids, 3-Quart and 6-Quart sauté pans with lids, 12-Inch chef's pan and 8-Quart stockpot with lid.
DISHWASHER SAFE: for the convenience and easy clean up.
HEATS AND COOKS EVENLY: 3-ply bonded construction consists of durable stainless steel encapsulating an aluminum core for even heating throughout and consistent cooking results.
OVEN SAFE: Oven- and broiler-safe up to 600 degrees F (without lids).
ANTI-WARP: Made in the USA, the stainless cookware offers warp-resistant strength.
